{"step_by_step_thinking": "Odontogenic tumors are neoplasms that arise from odontogenic (tooth-forming) tissues. Among the options, Odontogenic adenomatoid tumor and Odontoma are the most common odontogenic tumors. However, Odontomas are more commonly associated with unerupted teeth, especially in the anterior maxilla.", "answer_choice": "B. Odontoma"}
